nodes.title: SWE Portfolio Page
nodes.prompt: Create me an SWE portfolio page
nodes.what: A portfolio page showcasing the skills, projects, and achievements of a software engineer.
nodes.how: Organize the page into sections such as a hero section, project showcase, skills overview, and contact form.

children.title: Hero Section
children.prompt: Design a hero section for the portfolio page.

children.title: Project Showcase
children.prompt: Create a section to showcase projects.

children.title: Contact Form
children.prompt: Add a contact form for visitors to reach out.

nodes.title: Hero Section
nodes.prompt: Design a hero section for the portfolio page.
nodes.what: A visually striking hero section to introduce the portfolio.
nodes.how: Include a large title, a subtitle, and a call-to-action button.

children.title: Call-to-Action Button
children.prompt: Create a button for the hero section.

nodes.title: Projects Showcase Section
nodes.prompt: Create a section to showcase projects.
nodes.what: A section to display portfolio projects.
nodes.how: Use a grid layout with project cards.

children.title: Project Card
children.prompt: Design a card to represent a project.

children.title: Grid Layout
children.prompt: Create a grid layout for the project cards.

nodes.title: Contact Form Section
nodes.prompt: Add a contact form for visitors to reach out.
nodes.what: A section with a form for visitors to send messages.
nodes.how: Include input fields for name, email, and message, along with a submit button.

children.title: Submit Button
children.prompt: Create a button to submit the contact form.

nodes.title: Hero Section Button
nodes.prompt: Create a button for the hero section.
nodes.what: A button for the hero section.
nodes.how: Design a visually appealing button that fits the hero section's theme.

nodes.title: Project Card
nodes.prompt: Design a card to represent a project.
nodes.what: A card to showcase individual projects.
nodes.how: Create a visually distinct card with project details.

nodes.title: Project Cards Grid Layout
nodes.prompt: Create a grid layout for the project cards.
nodes.what: A grid layout to organize project cards.
nodes.how: Design a responsive grid layout for displaying project cards.

nodes.title: Contact Form Submit Button
nodes.prompt: Create a button to submit the contact form.
nodes.what: A button to submit the contact form.
nodes.how: Design a functional and visually clear submit button.
